name: Pi Estimate for Playdate
description:
An interactive mini game that shows how Pi can be estimated.

It's completely FREE with no strings attached.

Controls

  • Crank: Increase or decrease N continuously
  • A: set N to max
  • B: set N to min
  • Up: increase N by 10
  • Down: decrease N by 10
  • Left: decrease N by 1
  • Right: increase N by 1
